elements.label: Odile, an acquaintance
elements.description: This woman of striking beauty used to be a famous danseuse, before her main role was taken from her. That is when she took something in return. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Odile, a believer
elements.description: Her loyalties are hard to earn, yet for now they eclipse her ambitions. Odile has clipped her black wings to walk behind me, as my silken shadow.

elements.label: Odile, a disciple
elements.description: Odile excites the heartbeat to a brisé with a single ivory smile. It is hard to talk to her without getting distracted.

elements.label: Odile, a Cyprian
elements.description: Our Odile is a delight to look upon. Her velvets are the colour of rubies smuggled during a moonless soirée.

elements.label: Odile, a Troublemaker
elements.description: This isn't her first betrayal, nor is it her last.

elements.label: Odile, a Rival
elements.description: Odile has always enjoyed being a soloist.

elements.label: Odile, a Long in the Making
elements.description: Odile is prepared to spread her wings and rise ever higher. We must silence her swansong.

elements.label: Odile, a Prisoner
elements.description: She rises in anger and collapses in despair. We ignore her sweet whispers to the best of our abilities.
